sections.title: I: Journey's Beginning
items: Gather resources to build a [[house|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/House]]

Create a [[table|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Tables]], a [[chair|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Chairs]], and a [[door|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Doors]] for the {{npc|GUIDE|guide.png|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Guide}}
Gather ores to improve your equipment
Create a full set of armor with [[silver|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Silver_Ore]]/[[tungsten|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Tungsten_Ore]]
Explore caverns, find some [[Life Crystals|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Life_Crystal]], and consume a maximum of 4 of them
Collect some [[Fallen Stars|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Fallen_Star]] to craft some [[Mana Crystals|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Mana_Crystal]] and use them
{{npc|Nurse|nurse.png|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Nurse}}: use your first [[Life Crystal|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Life_Crystal]]
{{event|Blood Moon|blood-moon.png|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Blood_Moon}}: use your first [[Life Crystal|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Life_Crystal]] to unlock the event
{{npc|Merchant|merchant.png|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Merchant}}: get 50 silver coins
{{npc|Demolitionist|demolitionist.png|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Demolitionist}}: get an [[explosive|https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Explosives_(class)]]

sections.title: II: The Corruption
items: PAINTER: have at least 8 town NPCs
{{npc|Golfer|golfer.png|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Golfer}}: talk to him in the Underground Desert

sections.title: III: The Dungeon
items: Craft a [[Phaseblade|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Phaseblades]] (15 meteorite bars and 10 gems)
Isolate the NPCs from the corruption by creating a 6-blocks wide trench around their houses

sections.title: IV: The Hell
items: Craft an [[Obsidian Skull|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Obsidian_Skull]] (20 obsidian) (immunizes against fire damage)
Craft some [[Obsidian Skin Potions|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Obsidian_Skin_Potion]] (immunizes against lava damage)

sections.title: V: The Hardmode
items: Farm the {{boss|Wall of Flesh|wall-of-flesh.png|https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Wall_of_Flesh}} as many times as necessary to get the Pwnhammer and the Emblems
Destroy the altars in corrupted biomes with the Pwnhammer to spawn new ores
